description: This resource represents an individual schema version of a schema defined in Glue Schema Registry.

Schema.description: Identifier for the schema where the schema version will be created.

SchemaArn.description: Amazon Resource Name for the Schema. This attribute can be used to uniquely represent the Schema.
SchemaArn.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name for the Schema. This attribute can be used to uniquely represent the Schema.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: arn:(aws|aws-us-gov|aws-cn):glue:.*  
Update requires: No interruption

SchemaName.description: Name of the schema. This parameter requires RegistryName to be provided.
SchemaName.markdownDescription:
Name of the schema. This parameter requires RegistryName to be provided.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

RegistryName.description: Name of the registry to identify where the Schema is located.
RegistryName.markdownDescription:
Name of the registry to identify where the Schema is located.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

Schema.markdownDescription:
Identifier for the schema where the schema version will be created.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SchemaDefinition.description: Complete definition of the schema in plain-text.
SchemaDefinition.markdownDescription:
Complete definition of the schema in plain-text.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 170000  
Update requires: Replacement

VersionId.description: Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.
VersionId.markdownDescription:
Represents the version ID associated with the schema version.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}  
Update requires: No interruption
